price: Sai nãƙuda ta kai ta zuwa ga wani kututturen dabĩniya, ta ce "Kaitona, dã dai na mutu a gabãnin wannan kuma na kasance wani abu wulakantacce wanda aka manta!"
arabic: فَأَجَآءَهَا ٱلۡمَخَاضُ إِلَىٰ جِذۡعِ ٱلنَّخۡلَةِ قَالَتۡ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي مِتُّ قَبۡلَ هَٰذَا وَكُنتُ نَسۡيٗا مَّنسِيّٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-ajāahā al-makhāḍu ilā jidh'ʿi al-nakhlati qālat yālaytanī mittu qabla hādhā wakuntu nasyan mansiyyan
